name: WORKLY

scripts.db:init: PGPASSWORD=workly22692 psql -U workly2026 -d workly2026 -h localhost -f data/init.sql
scripts.db:seed: PGPASSWORD=workly22692 psql -U workly2026 -d workly2026 -h localhost -f data/seeding.sql
scripts.db:reset: PGPASSWORD=workly22692 psql -U workly2026 -d workly2026 -h localhost -f data/init.sql && PGPASSWORD=workly22692 psql -U workly2026 -d workly2026 -h localhost -f data/seeding.sql

author: Cheickna Coulibaly
description: Application Workly pour la création d'évènement d'entreprise, et information CE
